title: Top Quality of Regulations for International Trade
description: In 2024, Portugal achieved a high score of 88.92 in the quality of regulations for international trade, indicating a strong regulatory framework.

title: Excellent Quality of Labor Regulations
description: Portugal scored 88.23 in the quality of labor regulations in 2024, reflecting a robust and effective labor regulatory environment.

title: Perfect Female Persistence to Grade 5
description: In 2020, 100% of female students in Portugal persisted to grade 5, showcasing excellent retention in early education.

title: Perfect Female Persistence to Last Grade of Primary
description: Portugal achieved a 100% persistence rate for female students to the last grade of primary school in 2020, indicating strong educational outcomes.
